text:
e="preserve">Matthew Faber (May 12, 1972 – March 28, 2020) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles in movie and television series such as "Welcome to the Dollhouse", "Natural Born Killers", "Law & Order" and "Palindromes".
Faber died at his apartment in Van Nuys, California on March 28, 2020, at the age of 47.
